text: Go di maa Au, dela go Tagi go Yihowah, go di God mouli, deenei laa Au e hiihai bolo goodou gi hagalongo mai. Agu siibi guu kumi go nia manu lodo geinga gu dadaaligi digaula, ge guu gai digaula, idimaa, ma deai tangada e hagaloohi digaula ai. Agu gau hagaloohi hagalee halahala mai nia siibi. Digaula ne madamada humalia i nadau huaidina, hagalee haa manawa i agu siibi.
